title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, enabling programmatic interaction with local LLMs via simple Python calls.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, allowing Node.js and browser apps to integrate local LLMs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, adding chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines on top of local models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now Open WebUI) offering ChatGPT-like interface for local models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support for JVM projects.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API for Rails apps, enabling local LLM features in Ruby web projects.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat tool built on Ollama with conversation persistence and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension powered by Ollama for local code completion and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-driven collection of recipes and examples for deploying and extending Ollama in various scenarios.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI that supports Ollama as a backend, offering cross-platform desktop access to local models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support and persistent storage.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, monitoring, and GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template combining Ollama with ChromaDB for private RAG on local documents.

title: ollama-nim-sdk
summary: Nim language SDK for Ollama with async HTTP client and native JSON parsing for fast local integrations.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings and async Tokio client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for C# developers to integrate Ollama models into ASP.NET or desktop applications.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify orchestration platform plugin that registers Ollama models as LLM providers for no-code AI apps.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter auto-configuring Ollama REST client beans for rapid Java microservice integration.
